table.name: vtiger_support
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_support` (`supportid` int(11) NOT NULL, `supportno` varchar(100) default NULL, `support_tks_name` varchar(20) default NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`supportid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_supportcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_supportcf` (`supportid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`supportid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_support_user_field
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_support_user_field` (`recordid` int(25) NOT NULL, `userid` int(25) NOT NULL, `starred` varchar(100) default NULL , KEY (`vtiger_support_user_field`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
